scripts.gen-chain-metadata-westend-ah: pnpm exec papi add -w wss://westend-asset-hub-rpc.polkadot.io westend_ah
scripts.gen-chain-metadata-paseo-pah: pnpm exec papi add -w wss://testnet-passet-hub.polkadot.io paseo_pah
scripts.gen-chain-metadata-paseo-ah: pnpm exec papi add -w wss://asset-hub-paseo-rpc.n.dwellir.com paseo_ah
scripts.gen-contract-metadata: pnpm exec papi ink add metadata/ink_client.json
scripts.generate: pnpm run gen-chain-metadata-westend-ah && pnpm run gen-chain-metadata-paseo-pah && pnpm run gen-chain-metadata-paseo-ah && pnpm run gen-contract-metadata
scripts.prepack: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -rf .papi/descriptors/dist/* dist
